title: Will Intel reduce its workforce by at least 14% by August, 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if Intel confirms a reduction of at least 14% of its total workforce by August 31, 2024. The reduction must be officially announced or reported by Intel or in reputable financial news sources. If the reduction is less than 14% or not confirmed by the resolution date, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will a major chip manufacturer announce layoffs of over 10,000 employees by August, 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if any major chip manufacturer (including but not limited to Intel, AMD, or Nvidia) officially announces layoffs exceeding 10,000 employees by August 31, 2024. The announcement must be confirmed by the company or reported by at least two reputable financial news sources. If no such announcement is made or confirmed by the resolution date, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will a centennial celebration for a former U.S. President feature musical performances at a historic Atlanta theater by August, 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if a celebration event for the 100th birthday of a former U.S. President includes musical performances and takes place at a historic theater in Atlanta by August 31, 2024. The event must be officially recognized as a centennial celebration and include multiple musical acts. If the event does not feature musical performances or is not held at a historic Atlanta theater, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will India provide a $300 million loan to Vietnam for maritime security by August, 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if India provides a $300 million loan to Vietnam specifically for maritime security purposes by August 31, 2024. The loan must be officially confirmed by both Indian and Vietnamese government sources or reported by at least two major international news outlets. If the loan is not provided, or if it is provided but for a different purpose or amount, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will Vietnam announce a major maritime security project funded by a foreign loan by August, 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if Vietnam officially announces a significant maritime security project that is funded, at least in part, by a foreign loan by August 31, 2024. The announcement must come from an official Vietnamese government source or be reported by at least two major international news outlets. The project must be specifically related to maritime security. If no such announcement is made by the specified date, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will Paul J. DeCologero receive additional prison time for a new offense by August, 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if Paul J. DeCologero, who was sentenced for his involvement in James 'Whitey' Bulger's death, receives additional prison time for a new offense committed after his sentencing. The new offense must be separate from the Bulger case. The additional sentence must be officially announced by a court or correctional authority by August 31, 2024. If no such additional sentence is announced by this date, the question resolves as NO.

title: Will a US journalist be detained in Russia on espionage charges by August, 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if a journalist holding United States citizenship is detained in Russia on charges related to espionage or similar allegations by August 31, 2024. The detention must be officially acknowledged by Russian authorities and reported by multiple reputable international news sources. The charges must be explicitly stated as espionage or closely related accusations. The resolution is based on the occurrence of the detention, not on the validity of the charges or the outcome of any legal proceedings.

title: Will Utah's near-total abortion ban remain blocked by August, 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if Utah's near-total abortion ban remains blocked by August 31, 2024. The ban is considered 'blocked' if it is not in effect due to legal challenges or court orders. If the ban is implemented or goes into effect before the resolution date, the question resolves as NO. The status will be determined based on official statements from Utah's government or court rulings.

title: Will abortion remain legal up to 18 weeks in Utah by August, 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if abortion remains legal in Utah for pregnancies up to 18 weeks by August 31, 2024. If the legal limit for abortions in Utah is reduced below 18 weeks or increased beyond 18 weeks before the resolution date, the question resolves as NO. The status will be determined based on official Utah state laws or court rulings in effect on the resolution date.

title: Will a state Supreme Court ruling on an abortion law be overturned by August, 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if a state Supreme Court ruling related to an abortion law is overturned by a higher court or through legislative action by August 31, 2024. The overturning must be explicitly stated and officially recognized. If no such overturning occurs by the resolution date, the question resolves as NO. The status will be determined based on official court documents or legislative records.
